channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Cleanup Posts - Round One
item.description: I’m almost to the point of creating layouts for lists and single posts. Before I do, though, I want to clean up the posts that I’ve already completed.

item.title: Basic Home Page
item.description: I want my home page to show a list of my posts with the newest posts listed first.

item.title: Hello Template
item.description: Today I’m going to build a simple home page template for my site.

item.title: Creating a Post Archetype
item.description: My goal this morning is to create an archetype file for posts.

item.title: First Look at Archetypes
item.description: This post is about archetype files. Probably too much information, but it all starts with the archetype.

item.title: Starting with a Blank Slate
item.description: Canvas is a demonstration of building a site (and a theme) from the ground up.
